title: Drawing, "Hercules renders Horn from Bull Achelous", 1805
medium: Pen and brown ink over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
markings: Watermark: lion rampant, turned toward left, above, crown, below, FS.
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite: ercole vince il fiume acheloo
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Bull shown running toward right. At left, pen sketch of similar representation with Hercules shown in profile instead of from front.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Hercules renders Horn from Bull Achelous", 1805.
1805. Pen and brown ink over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3258.
